content: Excellent pure strategy game. It does require understanding of troop attributes and status effects, as well as how modifiers combine to give advantage, but once you master those things, it is addicting. replyContent: Thank you very much!!! Avalon Hill did indeed make some fun wargames.

content: Jolly Pixel makes my favourite games. Quietly literally, these games are extremely fun and the visual art style is extremely appealing to me.
